name: Simple Cleanup
author: multinet gmbh

sections.description: Why show the “Comments” link in the admin menu when you’re only running a small corporate website, or why add css classes you don’t need to your menu items? This plugin lets you easily disable some stuff WordPress adds by default.
sections.installation:
1. Upload “multinet-simple-cleanup” folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Configure the options on the “Simple Cleanup” settings page
sections.changelog:
0.3

  • Also remove “Edit comments” icon from admin bar

0.2

  • Also remove “New Post” option from admin bar and “Quick draft” dashboard box when disabling default posts

0.1

  • Initial release.

short_description: Provides options to clean up your WordPress backend and the generated HTML source of your website.
description: Why show the “Comments” link in the admin menu when you’re only running a small corporate website, or why add css classes you don’t need to your menu items? This plugin lets you easily disable some stuff WordPress adds by default.
